title: 2015 Christmas Champs
body: Can we have a Holly & Ivy Zyra please

replies.body:
Christmas beetle kha'zix

Snowball zac

Turkey azir

Campfire brand

roast anivia

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=wNY4FMyk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-13T12:03:35.832+0000)
>
> Present Day Gnar.
> 
> Polo Express Sion.
> 
> Queen of Snowfield Syndra.
> 
> Santa Shen, Shenta.
> 
> Jax Frost (Jack Frost from the 1998 snowman dad film). Ezreal already has the other Jack.
> 
> Jesus Karthus (Jethus) ????????
The only issue I have there is Jesus Karthus. Having a skin devoted at a specific religious figure would be quite controversial due to the diversity of players in League of Legends.

Order of the Lotus {{champion:43}} .....

Tbh more diversity = more fun.
